person.persName: Thomas Barbee (Danville, Kentucky, farmer and banker)

body.p: Danville, Kentucky, farmer and banker. Mercer County, Kentucky native. Married to Nancy O. Fry Barbee. Father of Sally H. Barbee, Joshua Barbee, Thomas F. Barbee, Nancy Barbee, and Alice Barbee. Farmer in Danville in 1860. Owned twenty-one enslaved persons in 1860. Partner with Thomas P. Mitchell in the banking firm of Mitchell & Barbee in 1865.
